content.rendered:
800 Features and Benefits

The Tennant 800 Industrial Ride-on Sweeper is built to capture everything from cement dust to heavy debris

  • Maximise cleaning productivity with the sweeper’s wide cleaning path, large capacity hopper and operator-friendly features
  • Withstands harsh environments with heavy-duty steel construction and high performance dust containment
  • Increased operator comfort with easy access to all sweeper controls and spacious cab

Key machine features of the 800 Industrial Ride-on Sweeper

  • Deluxe suspension operator seat, power steering and tilt steering wheel increase operator comfort
  • II Speed™ sweeping technology matches sweeping speed to the debris type
  • Large capacity, multi-level hopper (9 m) improves productivity by reducing the frequency of emptying

Choose the ideal options to tailor the 800 Industrial Ride-on Sweeper to your environment

  • Spacious cab provides a controlled, comfortable environment for the operator
  • Rear bumpers minimise damage to sweeper to protect your investment
  • Durable stainless steel hopper bottom prolongs machine life when cleaning in harsh environments

​

excerpt.rendered: Tennant’s 800 Industrial Ride-on Sweeper features a wide cleaning path and large capacity hopper to capture everything from cement dust to heavy debris.
